heading: HR00194
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE JOINT LEGISLATIVE-EXECUTIVE DEVELOPMENT ADVISORY COUNCIL (LEDAC), NATIONAL AGENCIES, LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS, AND THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT TO CONVENE IN A GOVERNMENT AUDITING REFORM SUMMIT THIS YEAR 2019 FOR THE PURPOSE OF CRAFTING A DRAFT BILL TO REFORM, UPDATE, AND FUTURE-PROOF THE CONDUCT OF STATE AUDIT IN THE PHILIPPINES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00194
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE JOINT LEGISLATIVE-EXECUTIVE DEVELOPMENT ADVISORY COUNCIL (LEDAC), NATIONAL AGENCIES, LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS, AND THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT TO CONVENE IN A GOVERNMENT AUDITING REFORM SUMMIT THIS YEAR 2019 FOR THE PURPOSE OF CRAFTING A DRAFT BILL TO REFORM, UPDATE, AND FUTURE-PROOF THE CONDUCT OF STATE AUDIT IN THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : UY, JULIETTE T.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-06
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2019-10-02
          -Referred to the Department of Budget and Management, Legislative –Executive Development Advisory Council, Commission on Audit, Department of Interior and Local Government, for position papers
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2019-08-13
